UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Arginine-lysine positional swap of the LL-37 peptides reveals evolutional advantages of the native sequence and leads to bacterial probes.
Literature.Author: Wang X, Junior JCB, Mishra B, Lushnikova T, Epand RM, Wang G

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=100 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:50% Cell death=30 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:50% Cell death=20 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=6.25µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=3.1-6.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=3.1µM)
